Density Independent Size

Best for development, Sketch users, multi-device design.

Width

Height

Export

×

More

Pros

Pixels in comp match density independent units* in code. Comp can be reused as a starting point for other layouts in a multi-device project.

Cons

For Photoshop HiDPI/Retina users, canvas might be unusably small. Exported screens might not be pixel-perfect in prototypes.

Tips

Create assets at highest resolution possible to support all high density displays. Link assets as smart objects if using Photoshop.

True Size

Best for Photoshop users, device-specific design.

Width

Height

More

Pros

Comfortable working size for Photoshop with HiDPI/Retina displays. Pixel-perfect screens for prototyping specifically to this .

Cons

Developer will need to divide all specs by to get density independent units* for code. Comp might be harder to reuse as a starting point for other device layouts. Complicates export settings in Sketch.

Tips

Append @x to the comp filename so that developers know to divide by for density independent units.
